products.name: Tide Jasmine & Rose Detergent Powder 5 kg (Get Extra 1 kg Free)
products.description: Tide's latest innovation features a multi-chamber liquid detergent. This design helps to clean, fight stains, and brighten your laundry in one, easy-to-use pac to provide an effortless, yet effective washing experience. Available in three fragrances (Spring Meadow, Ocean Mist, and Original), Tide PODS® work in all water temperatures and can be used in both standard and HE machines. We also have new 4in1 POD technology that is available in four varieties, depending on your laundry needs. You can choose from Tide PODS® Plus Downy April Fresh Scent, Tide PODS® Plus Febreze™, Tide PODS® Plus Febreze Sport Odor Defense, and Tide PODS® Ultra OXI Laundry Detergent. Packaged in a dissolvable film, this liquid detergent eliminates the need for tedious measuring and prevents spills while also ensuring accurate dosage and consistent results.
